\begingl[glneveryline={\EnglishGlossA,\EnglishGlossB}]
When[] the[] robe[] (-cloth)[] has[] been[] finished[] by[] a[] bhikkhu,[] when[] the[] kaá¹­hina[] (-frame-privileges)[] have[] been[] withdrawn,[] (then)[] extra[] robe[] (-cloth)[] is[] to[] be[] kept[] for[] ten[] days[] at[] the[] most.[] For[] one[] who[] lets[] it[] pass[] beyond[] (the[] ten[] days),[] (this[] is[] a[] case)[] involving[] expiation[] with[] forfeiture.[]
